reviewText: Billy Chong is great in this. Carl Scott is also good in his fight scenes. This is a classic action film. Evil villains mess with the wrong family and they have to fight to the death at the end of the film. This film is exciting from beginning to end. Recommended for action fans.
On of the best old classics
I was a huge fan of Bruce Lee and I was so sad when he died, but Billy Chong was a very good fighter as well.  The best fight scene was when Billy Chong fought at the end.
This is an awesome movie, Carl Scott is incredible
If you want to see a black man with kung fu skills then you need to buy this movie. The final fight is worth the value of the movie.

For those who haven't seen this movie, there is one easy way to descibe it, action packed. The story is very close to that of the first Godfather, just add in the kung fu. Fans of Billy Chong will not be disappointed in this film. Carl R Scott also does an excellent showing in this movie. The picture quality and sound were very good. If you watch this one and like it I would also recommend "A Hard Way To Die" with both Chong and Scott. Fans of Billy Chong might also want to pick up "Super Power" my all time favorite of his.
